Executive Summary

Premier Class A office building in the Dallas CBD. This 5-story property offers 25,000 square feet of premium office space with modern amenities including a renovated lobby, fitness center, and on-site conference facilities. The building features floor-to-ceiling windows with panoramic city views and efficient floor plates ideal for a variety of tenants.
